to frienziar 
If you updating from previous version CS:S. You must add to rev.ini (placed in game-dir) strings:

[Loader]
ProcName = hl2.exe -steam -game cstrike -appid 240 -novid

and replace

SteamDll = .binSteamSteam.dll

to

SteamDll = .SteamSteam.dll

Then off antivirus and run updater. After complete updating run game. Enjoy.

Correction:

replace

SteamDll = ./bin/Steam/Steam.dll

to

SteamDll = ./Steam/Steam.dll
